Text:
Holy Cow !! u really did it ... you're a legend.
Hats Off to u Sir :) and many many Thanx
THX a lot! I love Hawk World! You're the BEST ;)

By the way, you can find 7 of Hawkman's earliest Silver Age appearances (pre-Hawkman #1) in http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/7978093/

Just download Brave and the Bold 034 (first appearance), 035, 036, 042, 043, 044, and 051.
it has issue 10 missing in the Hawkman volume 3 folder.
